channel.title: Comments on: Love coming up behind on a bunch of campers‚Ä¶can‚Äôt believe I missed that last throw.
channel.description: Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War is a first-person shooter video game developed by Treyarch and Raven Software and published by Activision. r/BlackOpsColdWar is a developer-recognized community focused on the title.

item.title: By: modest_crayon
item.dc:creator: modest_crayon
item.description: Tried the machete out for the first time last night, double my average eliminations. Looked alot like this. Didn't know I liked being stabby so much
item.content:encoded: Tried the machete out for the first time last night, double my average eliminations. Looked alot like this. Didn’t know I liked being stabby so much

item.title: By: chemicalxbonex
item.dc:creator: chemicalxbonex
item.description:
I think the only thing that would make this even more delicious is if they were all camping with EM2's.
Great stuff either way. :)
Edit: That last guy was either AFK or the dumbest person in history. You cut his entire team to pieces right in front of him and he just stood there like a dope.
item.content:encoded:
I think the only thing that would make this even more delicious is if they were all camping with EM2’s.

Great stuff either way. üôÇ

Edit: That last guy was either AFK or the dumbest person in history. You cut his entire team to pieces right in front of him and he just stood there like a dope.

item.title: By: BigBoiGreggy
item.dc:creator: BigBoiGreggy
item.description: Then they call you bad when you just ran up behind a bunch of them camping.
item.content:encoded: Then they call you bad when you just ran up behind a bunch of them camping.

item.title: By: hvperRL
item.dc:creator: hvperRL
item.description: Try cranking up your FOV to 90-100. Personally play on 120
item.content:encoded: Try cranking up your FOV to 90-100. Personally play on 120
